title: Drawing, Designs for Three Art Deco Wrought Iron and Crystal Doors, ca. 1925
title_raw: Designs for Three Art Deco Wrought Iron and Crystal Doors
medium: Graphite, pen and white gouache, brush and brown watercolor on green paperboard; ruled border in pen and white gouache
markings: At lower right of image: small [1/2 x 1 in.] copyright stamp in black: LEY  7092/9510/DE PROTECCION/ A LA/PROPIEDAD/ARTISTICA
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and white ink, lower right:  puertas hierro forjado y cristal [doors in wrought iron and crystal]; in graphite, lower right:  F 263 [number encircled]
description: Three different designs for wrought iron and crystal doors.  From left to right:  door with panels in circular pattern; door with panels in alternating wave-like and geometric patterns; door with two decorative (wrought iron with italic initials "FC") panels at the top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Designs for Three Art Deco Wrought Iron and Crystal Doors, ca. 1925. Graphite, pen and white gouache, brush and brown watercolor on green paperboard; ruled border in pen and white gouache. 
Gift of Maureen Cogan. 1999-39-14
